translations: n．欢乐，快乐：愉快的心情或活动。
· The gaieties of the holiday season are something I look forward to every year.
我每年都期待着节日季节的欢乐时光。

sentences.sentence: As to her cousins' gaieties, she loved to hear an account of them, especially of the balls, and whom Edmund had danced with;
sentences.translation: 至于表姐们的娱乐活动，她倒喜欢听她们回来讲述，特别喜欢听她们讲述舞会的情况，讲述埃德蒙和谁跳的舞。
